prompt:

responses.gpt4: I understand, Ms. Odonnell. I'm here to help you manage your type 2 diabetes. However, we observed a change in your speech pattern. As part of our check-up, may I ask if you've experienced any sudden leg or arm weakness lately?
responses.our_model: Does the patient report sudden arm or leg weakness?
